detaileddescription.para: Term TF is a varia of the original term TI, such that for each variable V in the term TI there is a new variable V' in term TF without any attributes attached Attributed variables are thus converted to standard variables Goals is unified with a list that represents the attributes The goal maplist(call, _Goals_) can be called to recreate the attributes
attribute_goals/1 in the module where the attribute is defined
